form.name: Style 1
form.description: This is style #1 - Style 1 Parameters are set in the parameters/style1.xml - The stylesheet style1.css can be found in the template css folder. For more information on editing the parameters and the css please refer to the X-Framework user guide.

field.name: bodybg
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Body Background Color: Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.name: bodybgimg
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Full Website Background Image

field.name: bodybgposition
field.label: Image Position
field.description: Set Position of Image : example : no-repeat

field.name: bodybgsub
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Body Background Color: Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.name: bodybgimgsub
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Full Website Background Image

field.name: bodybgpositionsub
field.label: Image Position
field.description: Set Position of Image : example : no-repeat

field.name: bodybgmb
field.label: Mobile Background Color
field.description: Body Background Color: Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.name: bodybgimgmb
field.label: Background Image Mobile
field.description: Full Website Background Image

field.name: bodybgpositionmb
field.label: Image Position Mobile
field.description: Set Position of Image : example : no-repeat

field.name: bodymowidth
field.label: Mobile Width
field.description: Mobile level for Body

field.label: Wrap Image Position
field.description: Set Position of Image : example : no-repeat

field.name: header
field.label: Background Color
field.description: Background Color: Background Color for the Inner Wrap of the website set in the Grid Parameters: Example 960px. Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.name: headerimage
field.label: Background Image
field.description: Background Image for Header

field.name: headerposition
field.label: Background Image Position
field.description: Set Position of Image : example : no-repeat

field.name: logoImg
field.label: Website Logo Image
field.description: Select a Logo.

field.name: logowidth
field.label: Logo Width
field.description: Set logo width without px

field.name: logoheight
field.label: Logo Height
field.description: Set logo height without px

field.name: logopadding
field.label: Logo Padding
field.description: Set distance from menu edges to logo edges

field.name: logoImg2
field.label: Website Mobile Logo Image
field.description: Select a Logo.

field.name: logowidth2
field.label: Logo Mobile Width
field.description: Set logo width without px

field.name: logoheight2
field.label: Logo Mobile Height
field.description: Set logo height without px

field.name: logopadding2
field.label: Logo Mobile Padding
field.description: Set distance from menu edges to logo edges

field.name: logo2width
field.label: Logo Mobile Swap Width
field.description: Widtj of website to swap the logo

field.label: Item Hover Background Color

field.label: Item Active Background Color
field.description: Background Active color for each menu item link.Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.label: Color
field.description: Font Color for Main Menu

field.name: topleveltxtactivecolor
field.label: Active Color

field.description: Enter Hex or CSS3 RGBA Values Only - Enter transparent for none.

field.name: dropfont_color
field.label: Color
field.description: Font Color for Drop-down Menus

field.label: Hover Color
field.description: Font Color for the Drop Down Menu when mouse hover

field.name: dropfontactive_color
field.label: Active Color
field.description: Font Color for the Drop Down Menus when selected
